summary: Comprehensive testing completed for JavaScript Hosting Platform. Tested authentication, project management, script hosting, domain whitelisting, and JS delivery endpoints. Both backend APIs and frontend UI are fully functional with excellent success rates.

minor_issues.issue: Content-Type header returns 'application/json' instead of 'application/javascript' for successful JS delivery
minor_issues.impact: Minor - JS content is delivered correctly, but header is incorrect
minor_issues.details: Backend code sets correct media_type but response header shows application/json. May be API gateway/proxy issue.

design_issues.issue: Modern, clean SaaS design with proper color scheme and typography
design_issues.details: UI uses Plus Jakarta Sans font, professional dark theme (#0F172A), proper spacing and modern card layouts

passed_tests: Category listing (5 seeded categories: Website, Landing Page, AMP, Partner, Internal)
Project CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete, status toggle)
Script CRUD operations (create, edit, delete, status toggle)
Domain whitelist CRUD operations (add, list, update, delete)
Dashboard stats and recent projects display
JS delivery endpoint (allowed domains get real JS, denied domains get noop)
Domain validation (rejects invalid patterns like https://, *, localhost)
Frontend navigation (login/register pages, dashboard, projects, project detail)
Project creation with category selection via dropdown
Project detail tabs (Scripts, Whitelist, Embed, Analytics)
Real-time UI updates after API operations
Error handling and user feedback via toast notifications
